item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

item.title: [UK1][Workflow Management] - Mistral
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 1, 13:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jan 5, 23:32 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 01/02/2023 13:00 UTC 
End time : 01/02/2023 16:00 UTC 
Service impact : All mistral endpoints of WAW1 will be unreachable for 5 minutes
Service improvement :As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will migrate Mistral to a new production platform

item.title: [GRA2][Public Cloud] - G264B16
item.description:
Jan 12, 12:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 12/01/2023 09:00 UTC
End Time : 12/01/2023 12:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in rack G264B16 were unreachable
Root cause : A network equipment caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
